name: PINK MEDIA GROUP
sampleDescriptions: Reputation on all issues. Build rapport with the current ambassador and getting them meetings with DOD related companies, as they also have a new drone company that has a military focus.

Our main objective is to highlight the business activities of PMG and its owner Zelko Mitrovic as a media group that is fostering and strenghening ties between Serbia and the West, particularly the US
